/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in a pristine white, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their red roofs add a pop of color to the otherwise monochromatic palette. 

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. 

The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the scene, perhaps due to the absence of people or the stillness of the parked cars. It's a snapshot of a moment frozen in time, a glimpse into the everyday life in Beijing.
